verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end, \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H1732"\w* people \w that|strong="H1732"\w* \w is|strong="H1732"\w* removed \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H1732"\w* distance from \w the|strong="H1732"\w* sanctuary \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w for|strong="H1732"\w* an inscription \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H1732"\w* title (or pillar) when \w the|strong="H1732"\w* Philistines held \w him|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* Geth.

\w Have|strong="H0430"\w* \w mercy|strong="H8467"\w* \w on|strong="H0430"\w* me, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w for|strong="H0430"\w* man hath trodden me under foot; all \w the|strong="H0430"\w* day long \w he|strong="H0430"\w* hath afflicted me fighting against me.
My enemies have trodden on \w me|strong="H6030"\w* all \w the|strong="H6030"\w* day long; for they are many \w that|strong="H6030"\w* \w make|strong="H7181"\w* war against \w me|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* height \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* day \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* fear: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* God \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* praise \w my|strong="H5921"\w* words, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* God \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* put \w my|strong="H5921"\w* trust: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* not \w fear|strong="H0367"\w* \w what|strong="H5921"\w* flesh can do \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

All \w the|strong="H0935"\w* day long \w they|strong="H0935"\w* detested \w my|strong="H0935"\w* words: all \w their|strong="H0935"\w* thoughts were \w against|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w* unto evil.

\w They|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w and|strong="H0559"\w* hide themselves: \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* watch \w my|strong="H5414"\w* heel. \w As|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* waited \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* soul,
For nothing shalt thou save \w them|strong="H7368"\w*: in thy anger thou shalt break \w the|strong="H2009"\w* people in pieces, O God,
I have declared \w to|strong="H7307"\w* thee my life: thou hast set my tears \w in|strong="H7307"\w* thy sight, As also \w in|strong="H7307"\w* thy promise.

\w Then|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H7379"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* enemies \w be|strong="H0136"\w* turned back. \w In|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* day soever \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H7379"\w* call \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* thee, \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* know thou art \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* God \w will|strong="H2346"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* praise \w the|strong="H5921"\w* word, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H2346"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* praise \w his|strong="H5921"\w* speech. \w In|strong="H5921"\w* God \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* hoped, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H2346"\w* not fear \w what|strong="H5921"\w* man can do \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w In|strong="H7130"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, O \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w are|strong="H3808"\w* vows \w to|strong="H3808"\w* thee, which \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* pay, praises \w to|strong="H3808"\w* thee:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast delivered \w my|strong="H5921"\w* soul \w from|strong="H4480"\w* death, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* feet \w from|strong="H4480"\w* falling: \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* please \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sight \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w light|strong="H5375"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* living.
